Bolivia, and especially the capital city of La Paz, is undergoing a building boom. And with an increased demand for labor, many of the workers new to the construction industry are women, especially indigenous women from Bolivia's countryside.
The world, within the last few years, has become more and more aware of the population explosion.
After a lending boom, the global crisis struck.
